name: Spit Fight
description:
In a world where spit deals damage, you have to defeat your enemies using only the power of your mouth and some abilities. Good luck!

This game was made in 3 days for the second MashUp Game Jam.

Everything was made by me, except for the fonts, which I'll link below.
Elf Boy Classic Font | heaven castro | FontSpace
GamePixies Font | heaven castro | FontSpace

Note: The Linux version was not tested and I won't provide support for it.
